section_title:
15h03 - Hotels, motels, and
restaurants - contracts for lodging and meals.
text:
Contracts with hotels,
motels, and restaurants for the furnishing of lodging and meals are generally
subject to the CWHSSA. Employees such as maids, porters, cooks, dishwashers, waiters
and counterworkers would generally be considered laborers or mechanics covered
by CWHSSA.
html: Contracts with hotels, motels, and restaurants for the furnishing of lodging and meals are generally subject to the CWHSSA. Employees such as maids, porters, cooks, dishwashers, waiters and counterworkers would generally be considered laborers or mechanics covered by CWHSSA.
